participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing, always looking to bring joy to others through her baking.
participant_1.background: i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies. i am scared of dying. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and pragmatic, he finds thrill in outdoor activities and values a grounded lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i hate the color pink. my father was a construction worker. i don't drink alcohol. i'm a huge coffee lover.
